message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $10,800. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but $10,800 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,200. This would still give you a good deal considering the value of the product to you. Let me know if you're interested.

Hi Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $11,200. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
